title: News24.com | China's Wuhan raises virus death toll by 1 290, up 50%
description: China's coronavirus ground-zero city of Wuhan abruptly raised its death toll by 50%, saying many fatal cases were "mistakenly reported" or missed entirely in an admission that comes amid growing global doubts about Chinese transparency.
content:
China's coronavirus ground-zero city of Wuhan on Friday abruptly raised its death toll by 50%, saying many fatal cases were "mistakenly reported" or missed entirely in an admission that comes amid growing global doubts about Chinese transparency.
